segments.text: Honey , which hand should I use to hold the fork ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Left for the fork and right for the knife . Just remember that the stronger one is for knife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Got it . It's so troublesome to have western food . I've been learning the table manners for hours but still can't really it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Rather than eating , having western food is more about western culture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . Which restaurant are we going to tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cindy has reserved a table for us at a newly opened western restaurant downtown . She said the environment there was really pleasant .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . I believe in Cindy's taste . Oh , what should I wear ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should put on the black suit I bought for you last week . But I'm afraid it may be a bit crumpled . You'd better iron it now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't want to mess it up . Please do it for me . I'm going to the bank to cash some money . How much do we need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is no need to do that . I think the restaurant accepts credit cards . But it's necessary to make a budget .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Honey , you are a good accountant . So I'd better leave that to you , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that it's all about me . Then what do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll take care of the order .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK then . Well , 50 Yuan for appetizer , 200 Yuan for dinner and 200 Yuan for wine . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , then 50 Yuan for dessert . 500 Yuan all together .
segments.speaker: S2
